mapper.sql: id, ip, device, http_method, operation, method, args, exetime, logtime, logdata, logerror
mapper.insert: insert into log (id, ip, device, http_method, operation, method, args, exetime, logtime, logdata, logerror) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{httpMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{logerror,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into log
id,
ip,
device,
http_method,
operation,
method,
args,
exetime,
logtime,
logdata,
logerror,

mapper.update:
update log
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device = #{device,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
http_method = #{httpMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
args = #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exetime = #{exetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logtime = #{logtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logdata = #{logdata,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
logerror = #{logerror,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
